questions.question_text:
You are a Dynamics 365 Field Service dispatcher using the Scheduling Assistant function.
One of your customers, Adventure Works, does not want one of your resources to be scheduled to work orders going forward. The resource must be able to be scheduled for other accounts.
How can you achieve this goal?

choices.C: Select Load the Default Filters on the Schedule Board.
choices.A: Create a Requirement Resource Preference record for the resource. Set the Preference Type to Restricted and Cascade to No.
choices.D: Create a Requirement Resource Preference record for the resource.
choices.B: Create a Requirement Resource Preference record for the resource. Set the Preference Type to Restricted and Account to Adventure Works.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B

In exam, Jun-22

B is the correct answer.
B is the correct answer.

questions.question_text:
You are Dynamics 365 for Field Service Administrator and work for a manufacturing company. The company provides customers with large power systems for sophisticated data centers. The power systems are serviced by a field engineering team.
The field engineering team documents work done on repairs and maintenance by completing Work Orders within Dynamics 365.
You need to easily schedule work orders for the field engineering team via the schedule and enable geocoding.
Which two steps must you take to schedule resources via the schedule board and enable geocoding? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

choices.C: Set Auto Geo Code Addresses to Yes in Resource Scheduling.
choices.A: Connect to Maps in Resource Scheduling.
choices.B: Configure the map on the Schedule Board.
choices.D: Set Auto Geo Code Addresses to Yes in Field Service Settings.
